title: Were These Abraham Lincoln’s Last Words?
subtitle: Rumors of the former president's last words spoken in Ford's Theatre led us to consult the experts at the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Abraham Lincoln's last words were: "We will visit the Holy Land, and see those places hallowed by the footsteps of the Savior. There is no city on earth I so much desire to see as Jerusalem."
